item.title: 1.0.0-beta.13
item.description:
Bug Fixes

  • Update Check Feedback (Regression): Fixed "Check Now" button in preferences still not working after Issue #10
  • Root cause: Previous fix was never merged to master branch
  • "Last check" field now updates immediately when check starts (not just on success)
  • Added comprehensive visual feedback during check process with proper button states
  • Error messages displayed for failed update checks with timeout protection
  • Enhanced UI state management with color-coded success/error indicators
  • Includes 30-second timeout protection against hanging requests

Configuration Updates

  • Sparkle Auto-Update System: Fixed update check functionality for private repository
  • Updated SUFeedURL to use GitHub Pages: https://adamevers.github.io/circle-cast-releases/appcast.xml
  • Added GitHub Actions workflow step to automatically sync appcast to public repository
  • Enables update checking while keeping main repository private
  • Configured automated appcast deployment via GitHub Pages

item.title: 1.0.0-beta.5
item.description:
New Features

  • Trial implementation with 10-hour cumulative usage tracking
  • Auto-update system using Sparkle 2 framework
  • Offline license validation using Ed25519 signatures
  • Machine fingerprinting for license binding
  • GitHub Releases integration for automated distribution
